//: Pistols commonly owned by citizens and found in many locations.
Pistols commonly owned by citizens and carried by them. If a gun has mags, it has no loose ammo. If it has no mags, it has loose ammo.
Empty pistols found exclusively in gun stores.
Pistols including those only used by police/paramilitary forces, or self printed.
Pistols including those only used by police/paramilitary forces. As these are carried, they either have mags OR loose ammo rather than both
Military specification pistols only ever found at military sites.
Military specification pistols only ever carried by the military. Mags OR loose ammo
Imported or otherwise very obscure pistols.
Imported or otherwise very obscure pistols being carried, with either mags or loose ammo.
Makeshift or otherwise poor quality pistols.
SMGs commonly owned by citizens and found in many locations.
SMGs commonly owned by citizens and carried. Also has either mags or loose ammo.
Empty SMGs exclusively found in gun stores.
SMGs including those only used by police/paramilitary forces.
SMGs including those only carried by police/paramilitary forces. Either mags or loose ammo are included.
Military specification SMGs only ever found at military sites.
Military specification SMGs only ever carried by the military. Comes with mags or loose ammo.
Imported or otherwise very obscure SMGs.
Imported or otherwise very obscure SMGs. Just mags, no loose ammo.
Makeshift or otherwise poor quality SMGs.
Rifles owned by citizens and found in many locations.
Rifles commonly owned by citizens and carried by them. Has mags or loose ammo.
Empty rifles commonly found in gun stores.
Rifles including those only used by police/paramilitary forces or owned illegally.
Rifles including those only used by police/paramilitary forces or owned illegally.  Served with mags or a side of loose ammo.
Military specification rifles only ever found at military sites.
Military specification rifles only ever carried by the military. Issued with mags or loose ammo.
Crossbows, bows, slingshots carried by zombies.
Rare guns for bank vaults. No heavy weapons and LMGs.
Assorted factory crafted energy weapons.
Mostly imported or otherwise very obscure rifles.
Imported or otherwise very obscure rifles. Comes with mags or loose ammo.
Makeshift or otherwise poor quality rifles.
Shotguns commonly owned by citizens and found in many locations.
Shotguns commonly owned by citizens and carried for home defense. Has loose ammo, because these aren't the fancy mag-fed shotguns.
Shotguns commonly owned by citizens and found in gun stores.
Shotguns including those only used by police/paramilitary forces or owned illegally.
Shotguns including those only used by police/paramilitary forces or owned illegally.  Comes with loose ammo, unless one of these actually has mags, then it'd have mags.
Military shotguns currently in service.
Military shotguns currently in service. Might have mags, might have loose ammo.
Imported or otherwise very obscure shotguns.
Imported or otherwise very obscure shotguns. Actually has a decent chance of having mags instead of loose ammo.
Makeshift or otherwise poor quality shotguns.
Factory manufactured incendiary liquid projectors (excludes improvised weapons)
Factory manufactured grenade launchers (excludes improvised weapons)
Factory manufactured rocket launchers (excludes improvised weapons)
Factory manufactured grenade and rocket launchers (excludes improvised weapons)
Makeshift or otherwise poor quality grenade and rocket launchers
Guns of all types commonly owned by citizens and found in many locations.
Guns of all types commonly owned by citizens and found exclusively in gun stores.
Less common guns of all types including those only used by police/paramilitary forces.
Military specification guns of all types.
Imported or otherwise very obscure guns of all types.
Makeshift or otherwise poor quality guns of all types.
Police issue weapons of all types
Police issue weapons of all types. Carried, so they have mags or loose ammo.
Guns issued to paramilitary forces in addition to standard police issue.
Guns issued to paramilitary forces in addition to standard police issue. Comes with mags or loose ammo.
Guns typically carried by survivors, either improvised or thematically appropriate.
Guns typically used by hunters, be it rifles, shotguns or archery.
Guns typically used by hunters, be it rifles, shotguns or archery.
